info.name: Better Rumble
info.description: Tightens up page elements & removes a bunch of annoying stuff (like the join button for locals, upload button [because I'm just there to watch videos]) along with stupid categories on main page (Sports, Music, Power Slap, UFC, Finance, Cooking, etc...)
info.additionalInfo: This is just my personal Rumble css userstyle. It was made with StyleBot, so I don't know how Stylish would interpret it. You are welcome to copy and/or modify.
